channel.title: English Quran on MeVsFalse
channel.description: Recent content in English Quran on MeVsFalse

item.title: Quran Translation
item.description: 1 In the name of Allah, the Merciful, the Compassionate 2 Praise be to Allah, the Lord of the entire universe. 3 The Merciful, the Compassionate 4 The Master of the Day of Recompense. 5 You alone do we worship, and You alone do we turn for help 6 Direct us on to the Straight Way, 7 The way of those whom You have favoured, who did not incur Your wrath, who are not astray.
